name: Super Foofaraw 2: Reveng of the Mentors Turbo
name_original: Super Foofaraw 2: Reveng of the Mentors Turbo
description:
This is our entry to the chillenium 2016 game jam. This was a project that some of the mentors put together in between helping the students get their own projects done.

We had a great time making it and I hope you enjoy it!

PS: It's awful on purpose
